bwwExcerpt: Playing with a handful of substitutes, due to medical problems, the audience, which gave tepid applause to "Welcome to Hollywood," a less than dynamic curtain-raiser, warmed up when charming Olivia Valli, playing the Julia Roberts's role of Vivian, sang, "Any Where but Here," the show's "I want song," whose purpose is to clarify the desires of the leading character and set the plot on track.
